title: Lusaka National Museum
description: Explore Zambia's rich cultural history with exhibits on ethnography, art, and archaeology.

title: Kabwata Cultural Village
description: A traditional village offering crafts, souvenirs, and cultural experiences.

title: Munda Wanga Environmental Park
description: A wildlife sanctuary and botanical garden ideal for family outings.

title: EastPark Mall
description: A modern shopping mall with restaurants, cinema, and retail stores.

title: Freedom Statue
description: A symbol of Zambia's struggle for independence and a national monument.

title: Lusaka Playhouse
address: Corner of Addis Ababa and Great East Roads, Lusaka
description: Home to live theatre, concerts, and cultural events.

title: Arcades Entertainment Complex
description: Entertainment center with food, shopping, movies, and weekend craft market.

title: Sunday Craft Market
description: Popular local market with handmade crafts, jewelry, and art.
